name: Bookworm (itch) (miscmike, Yazorius, Polygon native, Loressa)
description:
A short prototype for Buddy Up Game Jam: Winter Edition. 

In this 2D educational platformer, you can help the BookWorm complete his BIG adventure! Featuring giants, kings and magic, players repair the story by dragging letters to their correct position.

Controls

Press W  + D or L/R arrows to move

Press SPACE to jump

Press G to grab letters

Credits

Design - Loressa, miscmike

Implementation - miscmike, BattleOoze

Story - Loressa, @polygonnative, Alphabet fridge

Art - cre

Music + Sfx - Yazorius

Free assets

https://opengameart.org/content/old-pagesflip-with-sound

https://opengameart.org/content/gold-frame

Story illustrations are all public domain sourced from Project Gutenberg
